title: Unleashing the Power of AI: Infor Velocity World Tour 2024 Makes Waves

title: Nvidia Simplifies 3D Modeling with AI-Prompted Generation
description: Nvidia has unveiled its latest AI technology, Latte3D, capable of transforming text prompts into intricate 3D models. With AI making strides in various fields, from image generation to natural language processing, the realm of 3D art creation has long awaited a similar breakthrough. Now, Nvidia’s Latte3D promises to bridge this gap, offering a novel solution […]

title: Polkadot Goes PINK: Memecoin Launch and Parachain Airdrops Spark DOT Momentum
description: Polkadot introduces the PINK token, focusing on community involvement and fair distribution. PINKDROP game engages users, offering rewards and promoting interaction within the Polkadot ecosystem Polkadot, a leading blockchain platform, has introduced its newest community token, PINK, as part of its ongoing efforts to bolster community engagement and expand its ecosystem. This move represents a [...]

title: Why Bitcoin’s Limited Supply Is Foundational to the Current Surge
description:
Of the many breakthroughs that Satoshi gave us with Bitcoin, its hard-capped supply and programmatic issuance have always been most captivating to me. Unlike any other money the world has ever seen, it is impossible to create more of it than the supply schedule dictates. New Bitcoins are issued every 10 minutes as ‘block rewards’ […]

The post Why Bitcoin’s Limited Supply Is Foundational to the Current Surge appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
